data.name: Description_Object_Precision
data.value: For numeric data, the maximum number of decimal digits that can be stored in this database object.

data.name: Description_Parameter_Ordinal
data.value: The position of this object in the parent database object definition.

data.name: Description_SharedMemory
data.value: Name of the shared memory object to use

data.name: Description_Server
data.value: The MySQL server IP or hostname.

data.name: TableCharSetDesc
data.value: The default character set to use for this table.

data.name: Description_UDF_IsAgregate
data.value: Indicates if the function is aggregate function.

data.name: Description_Database
data.value: The default schema name. Can be empty, but it is not recommended.

data.name: Description_Table_AverageRowLength_Option
data.value: An approximation of the average row length for the table. Set this value only for large tables with variable-size records.

data.name: UnknownDbPromptCreate
data.value:
The database '{0}' does not exist or you do not have permission to see it.
Would you like to create it?

data.name: TableMinRowsDesc
data.value: The minimum number of rows you plan to store in the table.

data.name: Description_Trigger_EventManipulation
data.value: An event on which the trigger is switched on

data.name: Description_MinPoolSize
data.value: The minimum number of connections allowed in the pool

data.name: Description_Object_Server
data.value: The host name of the MySQL server which runs underlying database.

data.name: UnableToExecuteProcScript
data.value: Unable to execute the create script. SQL batch must begin with CREATE or ALTER.

data.name: Description_Object_Schema
data.value: The schema which owns the database object.

data.name: Description_Table_InsertMethod
data.value: If you want to insert data into a MERGE table, you must specify with INSERT_METHOD the table into which the row should be inserted. INSERT_METHOD is an option useful for MERGE tables only. Use a value of FIRST or LAST to have inserts go to the first or last table, or a value of NO to prevent inserts.

data.name: DropConfirmation
data.value: Are you sure you want to drop the {0} '{1}'?

data.name: Description_Object_Length
data.value: The maximum length (in characters) that can be stored in this database object.

data.name: Description_StoredProcedure_Body
data.value: Language of the body of the routine

data.name: Description_Trigger_RefToOldRow
data.value: An action reference to an old row

data.name: Description_UseSSL
data.value: Should the connection use SSL. This currently has no effect

data.name: Description_Object_Collation
data.value: The collation that is used to compare text for the database object.

data.name: Description_Table_RowFormat
data.value: The row format used for the table.

data.name: Description_Table_AutoIncrement
data.value: The initial AUTO_INCREMENT value for the table. Only for MyISAM tables with a least one AUTO_INCREMENT column.

data.name: Description_UDF_Dll
data.value: The basename of the file containing the implementation of the function.

data.name: Description_Table_IndexDirectory_Option
data.value: By using this option you can specify where the MyISAM storage engine should put a table's index file. The directory must be the full pathname to the directory, not a relative path.

data.name: Description_Table_DelayKeyWrite
data.value: Set this option if you want to delay key updates for the table until the table is closed. (MyISAM only.)

data.name: Description_Column_SqlType
data.value: The ANSI SQL type definition for the column.

data.name: Description_View_IsUpdatable
data.value: Indicates if the table or view is updatable

data.name: Description_StoredProcedure_IsDeterministic
data.value: Defines if the routine is deterministic

data.name: TableCheckSumDesc
data.value: Set to true if you want a live checksum maintained for this table.

data.name: Description_Pooling
data.value: When true, the connection object is drawn from the appropriate pool, or if necessary, is created and added to the appropriate pool

data.name: Description_Object_Database
data.value: The database catalog which owns the database object.

data.name: TableAutoIncStartDesc
data.value: The starting auto-increment value for this table.

data.name: Description_Trigger_EventTable
data.value: A table on which an action is performed

data.name: Description_Protocol
data.value: Protocol to use for connection to MySQL

data.name: Description_Trigger_EventSchema
data.value: A schema on which an action is performed

data.name: Description_Table_Password
data.value: Use this option to encrypt the .frm file with a password. This option does nothing in the standard MySQL version.

data.name: Description_Column_Nullable
data.value: Indicates if null values are allowed in this database object.

data.name: TableMaxRowsDesc
data.value: Provides a hint to the storage engine as to how many rows you plan to store in the table.

data.name: Description_Table_TableRows
data.value: The amount of rows in the table.

data.name: DelayKeyWriteDesc
data.value: True if you want to delay key updates until the table is closed. (MyISAM only)

data.name: Description_Column_Extra
data.value: The advanced options for the column.

data.name: TableDataDirDesc
data.value: The directory used to store the data files for this table.

data.name: Description_Table_DataDirectory_Option
data.value: By using this option you can specify where the MyISAM storage engine should put a table's data file. The directory must be the full pathname to the directory, not a relative path.

data.name: ErrorAttemptingToDrop
data.value: The following error occured while attempting to drop the {0} '{1}': {2}

data.name: Provider_Description
data.value: Use this selection to connect to MySQL Server using the .NET Framework Data Provider for MySQL

data.name: Description_View_Algorithm
data.value: Indicates how to treat a view in SQL statements

data.name: TableAvgRowLengthDesc
data.value: The average row length for this table. Set this only for large tables with variable-size rows.

data.name: ConnectionPropertiesNull
data.value: An error occurred that is normally caused by not having Connector/Net properly installed.

data.name: TableSchemaDesc
data.value: The schema this table belongs to.

data.name: ColumnWillBeDeleted
data.value: Column name missing for column definition. Column will be deleted. To correct, choose cancel and specify the name of the column.

data.name: Description_PerfMonitor
data.value: Indicates that performance counters should be updated during execution

data.name: Description_Table_AverageRowLength
data.value: The average length for the rows in the table.

data.name: Description_StoredProcedure_Type
data.value: Type of the routine (procedure or function)

data.name: Description_UseOldSyntax
data.value: Allows the use of old style @ syntax for parameters

data.name: Description_Object_CreationTime
data.value: The date and time when the database object was created.

data.name: Description_Table_DataLength
data.value: The data length for the table.

data.name: ProductDetails
data.value: Data design and management tools for MySQL. Copyright © 2007-2009 MySQL AB

data.name: Description_Table_RowFormat_Option
data.value: Defines how the rows should be stored. For MyISAM tables, the option value can be FIXED or DYNAMIC for static or variable-length row format. myisampack sets the type to COMPRESSED.

data.name: Description_Table_MaxRows_Option
data.value: The maximum number of rows you plan to store in the table. This is not a hard limit, but rather a hint to the storage engine that the table must be able to store at least this many rows.

data.name: Description_Object_CharacterSet
data.value: The default character set that is used for the database object.

data.name: AlterTriggerOnWrongTable
data.value: Cannot alter trigger '{0}' on '{1}' because this trigger does not belong to this object. Specify the correct trigger name or the correct target object name.

data.name: TableInsertMethodDesc
data.value: Determines which table in a merge table receives updates.

data.name: Description_ConnReset
data.value: When true, indicates the connection state is reset when removed from the pool

data.name: Description_Table_PackKeys
data.value: Use this option to generate smaller indices. This usually makes updates slower and reads faster. Setting it to DEFAULT tells the storage engine to only pack long CHAR/VARCHAR columns.

data.name: Description_Table_Checksum_Option
data.value: Set this option if you want MySQL to maintain a live checksum for all rows (that is, a checksum that MySQL updates automatically as the table changes). This makes the table a little slower to update, but also makes it easier to find corrupted tables. The CHECKSUM TABLE statement reports the checksum. (MyISAM only.)

data.name: Description_Object_Comment
data.value: The brief description of the database object.

data.name: Description_Parameter_IsResult
data.value: Shows if this parameter is the return value for the routine.

data.name: ErrorDuringLoad
data.value: An error was encountered during loading.

data.name: Description_Column_ColumnKey
data.value: The way this column participate table keys and indices.

data.name: Description_ConvertZero
data.value: Should illegal datetime values be converted to DateTime.MinValue

data.name: TablePackKeysDesc
data.value: Determines if indexes are packed. This will slow down updates and inserts.

data.name: Description_Table_Union
data.value: List of MyISAM tables that should be used by the MERGE table.

data.name: Description_AllowBatch
data.value: Allows execution of multiple SQL commands in a single statement

data.name: Description_Trigger_RefToOldTable
data.value: An action reference to an old table

data.name: Description_Column_Default
data.value: The default value used to initialize new row values for this column.

data.name: Description_OptionFile
data.value: Name of the file with startup options

data.name: Description_Parameter_StoredProcedure
data.value: The stored procedure that owns this database object.

data.name: FKColumnsNotMatched
data.value: Both sides of a relationship must have the same number of columns.

data.name: Description_Object_MySqlType
data.value: The native MySQL type for the database object.

data.name: Description_StoredProcedure_ParameterList
data.value: List of parameters of the routine

data.name: Description_LifeTime
data.value: The minimum amount of time (in seconds) for this connection to live in the pool before being destroyed

data.name: UnableToRetrieveDatabaseList
data.value: Unable to retrieve the list of databases

data.name: Description_Trigger_Statement
data.value: A statement executed by the trigger

data.name: Description_Trigger_RefToNewRow
data.value: An action reference to a new row

data.name: TableIndexDirDesc
data.value: The directory used to store the index files for this table.

data.name: Description_CharacterSet
data.value: Character set this connection should use

data.name: Description_Object_Flags
data.value: The flags used to modify data type of this database object.

data.name: Description_Object_Table
data.value: The table which owns the database object.

data.name: ErrorAttemptingToCreateDB
data.value: There was an error attempting to create the database '{0}'

data.name: Description_Trigger_Order
data.value: The order number of the action

data.name: Description_PipeName
data.value: Name of pipe to use when connecting with named pipes (Win32 only)

data.name: TableCollationDesc
data.value: The default collation to use for this table.

data.name: Description_Timeout
data.value: The length of time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to the server before terminating the attempt and generating an error

data.name: Description_Table_MinRows_Option
data.value: The minimum number of rows you plan to store in the table.

data.name: Description_Trigger_EventCatalog
data.value: A catalog on which an action is performed

data.name: Description_Table_UpdateDateTime
data.value: The date and time when the table was updated last time.

data.name: Description_Object_Scale
data.value: For numeric data, the maximum number of decimal digits that can be stored in this database object to the right of a decimal point.

data.name: Description_Trigger_Orientation
data.value: An atomic object of a trigger action

data.name: Description_Column_OctetLength
data.value: The maximum length (in bytes) that can be stored in the column. Should be the same as Length, except for multi-byte character sets.

data.name: Description_Column_Ordinal
data.value: The position of this object in the parent database object definition.

data.name: Description_Table_MaxDataLength
data.value: The maximum data length for the table.

data.name: Description_Trigger_RefToNewTable
data.value: An action reference to a new table

data.name: Description_CacheSize
data.value: Indicates how many stored procedures can be cached at one time. A value of 0 effectively disables the procedure cache

data.name: Description_Table_CreateOptions
data.value: The options, used to create the table.

data.name: Description_MaxPoolSize
data.value: The maximum number of connections allowed in the pool

data.name: Description_Table_Engine
data.value: The storage engine used for the table.

data.name: Description_Schema
data.value: The schema that owns the database object.

data.name: TableRowFormatDesc
data.value: Defines how the rows should be stored.

data.name: Description_Port
data.value: The port to use when connecting with sockets

data.name: Description_DriverType
data.value: Specifies the type of driver to use for this connection

data.name: Description_Persist
data.value: When false, security-sensitive information, such as the password, is not returned as part of the connection if the connection is open or has ever been in an open state

data.name: Description_Table_Connection_Option
data.value: The connection string for a FEDERATED table. This option is available as of MySQL 5.0.13; before that, use a COMMENT option for the connection string.

data.name: Description_StoredProcedure_ExternalLanguage
data.value: External language used to write the routine

data.name: Description_Table_CheckDateTime
data.value: The date and time when the table was checked last time.

data.name: Description_StoredProcedure_DataAccess
data.value: Type of data access of the routine

data.name: ConnectionStringInvalid
data.value: The specified connection string is invalid.

data.name: Description_StoredProcedure_LastModified
data.value: Time of the last modification of the routine

data.name: Description_Object_Name
data.value: The name of the database object.

data.name: Description_Table_IndexLength
data.value: The index length for the table.

data.name: WebConfigConnStrNoEmpty
data.value: The connection string must not be empty.
